Body:
input_dir = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', 'convert_2_magic', 'sufar_asc_magic'
    )
infile = 'sufar4-asc_magic_example.txt'
program_ran, outfile = convert.sufar4(infile, meas_output=
    'my_magic_measurements.txt', aniso_output='my_rmag_anisotropy.txt',
    specnum=2, locname='Here', instrument='INST', static_15_position_mode=
    True, input_dir_path=input_dir, sample_naming_con='5', data_model_num=2)
self.assertTrue(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(outfile, os.path.realpath(os.path.join('.',
    'my_magic_measurements.txt')))
